SK.SETTINGS.WORLD_VERSION_HINT: Used to automatically upgrade worlds data when the system is upgraded.
SK.SETTINGS.DATASET_DIR_HINT: Path to a directory that contains system data.
SK.HELP.SKILLS.CLICK: Click on a skill to use it or Shift+Click to spend more than 1 AP (default behavior).
SK.HELP.CLICK_SETTING: You can swap this behavior in the system settings.
SK.HELP.WEAPON.CLICK: Click on a weapon to use it or Shift+Click to spend more than 1 AP (default behavior).
SK.LABEL.NAME: Name
